message.content:
{"id": "6125", "title": "Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late", "description": "When pressing the finish button in the JAR packager, an error message displays: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.", "OB": "The JAR packager fails to create the JAR file when there are unsaved open files.", "EB": "The JAR packager should validate and prompt the user to save any unsaved open files before proceeding with the JAR creation.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a file in the project. 
2. Make changes to the file without saving. 
3. Open the JAR packager for the project. 
4. Enter the necessary details such as path, destination, name, and description for the JAR packager. 
5. Press the finish button. 

Expected result: The JAR packager should validate the open files and prompt the user to save any unsaved files before proceeding with the JAR creation."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '6125', 'title': 'Bug 6125JAR packager reports open files very late', 'description': "press finish: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5. ", 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': "1. edit in a file, don't save2. open the JAR packager on it's project3. enter all path, destination, name of jar packager description, etc4. "}
